meanings.definition: A medical facility that provides a variety of health services
meanings.sent1: The polyclinics in our town offer services for different health needs.
meanings.sent2: I visited the polyclinics for my regular check-up.
meanings.sent3: At the polyclinics, they even have a play area for kids in the waiting room.
meanings.sent4: The polyclinics are like a one-stop shop for healthcare.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the polyclinics make them easy to spot from afar.

meanings.definition: The practice of providing medical care in multiple specialties at one location.
meanings.sent1: Polyclinics are convenient for patients needing care from different specialists.
meanings.sent2: The hospital decided to implement polyclinics to streamline patient care.
meanings.sent3: I never knew medical care could be so efficient until I experienced polyclinics.
meanings.sent4: Polyclinics bring together various medical fields under one roof.
meanings.sent5: The concept of polyclinics revolutionized healthcare accessibility in our city.
